articles.title: PTI to move IHC seeking live-telecast of Imran’s telethon
articles.description: PTI has decided to approach Islamabad High Court (IHC) for the live telecast of former prime minister Imran Khan’s international telethon
articles.content:
The Pakistan Tehreek-e-Insaaf (PTI) has decided to approach Islamabad High Court (IHC) for the live-telecast of former prime minister Imran Khan’s international telethon for flood victims, scheduled to be held on Monday night (today).

articles.description: AFTER three years, the Philippines may soon establish its first border inspection facilities next year as the government appropriated P1 billion for their construction under the proposed 2023 national budget. articles.title: Percutaneous coronary intervention provides no benefit in patients with severe left ventricular dysfunction
articles.description: Percutaneous coronary intervention (PCI) does not reduce all-cause mortality or heart failure hospitalization in patients with severe left ventricular dysfunction and extensive coronary artery disease, according to late breaking research presented in a Hot Line session today at ESC Congress 2022.

articles.title: WATCH: India demolishes 100-metre-high Noida twin towers
articles.description: Indian authorities demolished two illegally constructed skyscrapers in a wide plume of dust debris on Sunday near the capital New Delhi.
articles.content:
Indian authorities demolished two illegally constructed skyscrapers in a wide plume of dust debris on Sunday near the capital New Delhi.

articles.title: The Greywolf 'goldmine' that never paid off and the elusive man behind it all
articles.description: Novice investors were convinced to place their hard-earned money in Greywolf, assured of life-changing riches. Instead, they became part of a trail of financial destruction.
articles.content:
It may sound like an unlikely hunting ground, but a coastal bowling club full of cash-strapped seniors was the perfect place for Greywolf to find seed investors.
